structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Board of park commissioners, advisory only -- Election of officers of board -- Rules -- Promotion of park facilities.
law.text: The board of park commissioners shall be an advisory board only, it being the intention of KRS 97.425 to 97.485 to vest all powers relating to parks, playgrounds, and recreation in the city, subject to the provisions of KRS 97.020. The board of park commissioners, after their appointment, shall convene and elect a president of the board and a secretary. It shall establish rules, not inconsistent with the provisions of KRS 97.405 to 97.485, and shall fix the time and place for the holding of its meetings. The board shall advise the legislative body of the city on appropriate park and recreational programs and projects, and shall promote the full use of all park facilities in the interest of the public.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 3, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 7, effective May 18, 1956.
